case.state: Now neither of us will be virgins! Ohoho!
OHOHOHO! It is I, the one, the only, the most beautiful princess of all, Sweetheart!
My own clone!
Rejoice, peasants! Though none of you are worthy of being in my presence. I have come to grace you all! Also, I expect to be greatly entertained while I'm here, so don't disappoint me.
Perfect! I have no desire to change anything.
A perfect hand for a perfect princess!
For once, the dealer didn't disappoint me.
Give me ~cards.text~!
Remove these ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ from my sight.
I demand ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ to be switched.
I don't need these, give me ~cards.text~ better ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
These ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ can go away.
Hmmm...Take these ~cards.text~.
I only want the cream of the crop!
~cards.ifPlural(These|This)~ ~cards.text~ ain't good enough. Change them!
What are you waiting for, Dealer? Remove ~cards.ifPlural(These|This)~ ~cards.text~.
Chop-chop, Dealer. Bring me my ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ already.
Perhaps this place could be elevated if it had some... violins playing in the background.
OHOHOHOHOHOHOHO!
It's only natural that my poker skills match my beauty!
What was it again that was considered the best hand to have? A royal flush? Well, why haven't I gotten that yet?
As royalty, it's a simple fact that I deserve the best of the best -- from clothes, to jewels, to even something as meaningless as cards.
Only the best for a captivating princess like me!
It sure is tiresome being so good at everything.
BWAHA- Oh wait, wrong laugh. OHOHO!
Mirror mirror, on the wall, who's the prettiest of them all? Why, me, of course!
Like swimming in my vault of Clams! Hm?... What are Clams? Ugh... do you even use that bird brain of yours? It is what you peasants call "Money".
Finally! After many weeks of my worthless servants failing, they've managed to capture the most beautiful planet of all, Pluto! Dare I say, he's now one of my finest statues.
Aren't these fingernails just gorgeous? Castella has done a wonderful job painting them. One of the only worthwhile servants I have.
Afraid of falling in love? Don't be, nobody can resist me, and I could always use more fans.
Perhaps next time... I will bring a mirror, so that I can adore myself while waiting.
I have never once shown mercy to my enemies, and I'm not about to start either!
Gaze upon all that I am, ~player~. You won't find any lady half as beautiful as I am.
I do so despise these kinds of hands. They keep you guessing if you might win or lose! Such stressful situations aren't good for a lady of my caliber, you know.
Hmm... Perhaps I should have brought Sprout Mole Mike with me. He could have entertained me in between rounds. A bored princess is an angry princess.
Let us make one thing very clear. None of you are allowed within my personal space, too often do zealous fans try and get a handful of me. Which I do not tolerate!
Excuse me, dealer. It seems you have given me a commoner's hand. I hope I don't need to explain why this shouldn't be the case, right?
Hmm... This hand does give me inspiration for my next movie.
There is nothing glamorous about these cards... How utterly dull.
I've seen commoners with more personality than these cards.

This is not the first time that I've played poker. I have played plenty of rounds with my servants. However, they kept complaining about having no arms or hands to hold the cards with, but the only thing I heard was them making up excuses.
All servants and visitors that enter my castle must obey the dress code. Either you wear pink, or I will have you thrown off the roof!
Hmph! What a waste of time, none of you are worthy of becoming my suitor. I mean, do you all see how magnificent I look? How can you all compare?
Despite you all being utter clowns, you have failed to entertain me! Even a Sprout Mole could do better!
At such dull moments, I often have my servants play theatrics to get rid of the boredom.
All of you simpletons should be honored to be able to bask in my glory. Most don't even get a glimpse!
Hard to care about what my hand is when I just look so desirable.
What ugly cards. The ones I've got at home are much better. Why? Because they have my face on it, of course!

I rule my castle with an iron fist! Those that serve under me must perform at the absolute highest level. If they don't? Well, the deepest parts of my dungeon will be the last thing they will ever see!
Hmph! Had it been one of my servants giving me this hand, I would have had them thrown into the dungeon!
I better not catch any of you cheating. If I do see you doing it, I'll have a special place in my dungeons just for you!
These cards… their very sight makes me want to shred them!
This is no hand worthy of a princess! I demand new cards!
Preposterous!
Hmph! No matter, I bet you peasants don't even have a pair! Ohoho!
Ugh, I just remembered. I have to do a photo-shoot later today. Sigh... It's just so hard being a princess!

Someone! Get me a fruit juice! I'm thirsty!
...Helloooooo!? Are you deaf?
If I find out that any of you have been conspiring against me, I shall bring you to my dungeon and torture you personally! This isn't a threat... It. Is. A. Promise!
The nerve of you lot... Giving me this horrible hand just because you're jealous of my beauty!
Hmph! This is blasphemy! Blasphemy, I say!
How utterly frustrating! I feel a conspiracy afoot!
This is outrageous! This is unfair! What kind of monster would give a princess like me this hand!?
Hmph, my delicate feet have been standing on the cold floor for far too long. You! ~player~! Get on your hands and knees. I need a place to sit on.
What beautiful and stunning scenery! This would be the perfect place for someone to declare their love for me!
Hmm...This place is way too dull for my liking. In my humble opinion, pink would suit it better.
I have the most magnificent idea... Guards! Bring me the orchestra. This would greatly improve the atmosphere.
Hmph, I don't have all day, ~player~. Pick already!
My patience runs thin, ~player~. Get to it!
I know you've never seen a lady quite as stunning as me, ~player~. But I have other things to do after this game, so get moving!
Silly low-born! A princess like me doesn't need the validation or praise from commoners. But I still deserve it all the same.
Is it not natural to praise those that are superior to you? Though I do not need the admiration of those beneath me, it is still the right thing for them to do.
If you were even half as pretty as I am, you would understand the desire to flaunt your beauty everywhere you go.
How absurd of you to think that I am anything less than the most elegant and pretty princess that has ever walked the earth.
Me? Ending up creamed? Oh please, leave it to the serf to not understand that a princess always wins in the end!
I can hardly take the comments of a lady that smells of cigarettes and cheap booze seriously. At least it's clear who is going to end up "creamed" in the end! Ohohoho!
Something wrong, peasant? Can't handle the beauty that is I? Sweetheart?
It's not my fault that you're too stupid to realise how a proper princess is supposed to act. I'm simply better than everyone else.
Hmm... It seems I'm not getting the attention and adoration I deserve. This can only mean one thing: you don't know who I am. Impertinent, but I suppose it cannot be helped.

Unbelievable! after I put in all that effort in telling you why I am the most desired princess of all, you all still aren't giving me the praise I am due! Perhaps you imbeciles need to hear more examples of why I am the greatest princess that has ever lived!
Hmph, though I find it absurd that I lost again, I do not shy away from my body like other princesses.
Ohohoho! Do you think I feel ashamed having to show off my beautiful figure to the world? No, of course not! The world should be grateful for having me on it!
You lucky fools don't know how good you all have it! For you all will witness the full beauty of the most elegant, attractive, stunning, brilliant, and most gorgeous princess of all!
Not one of you is worthy of what you are about to witness. This kind of beauty is one of a kind. There is no other princess... no... there is no other lady alive who compares to me!
Fufu~ One more measly strip won't change the outcome of this match.
Struggle all you like, peasants. It won't change the outcome of this match.
You will try and you will fail trying to beat me! One more loss means nothing to the mighty sweetheart!
Don't get too cocky, losers! Sweetheart has never ever lost in anything!
Don't get too comfortable now. I am still destined to win and see you all grovel before me!
Ohohohoho! Your struggles to beat me are meaningless! Attempt it all you want, but you will not succeed!
Hmph, I might not have any big things left to take off. This doesn't make my stripping any less important! So keep your eyes on me!
They say that you can't always win... Which is utter nonsense! I always win! But... ugh.
You should really count yourself lucky that I am such a delicate princess. I can accept this loss, even if it was totally undeserved! But...
Alright, which of you losers decided to cheat to make me lose? ...Not going to talk, are we? I'll be sure to remember that.

Impudent! Cheating against a princess is punishable by death! But if the one who cheated comes forward about it, I might just lower the sentence to community service... Not going to speak up now, are you? Tsk.
Ugh! Princesses aren't supposed to lose! Which of you vermins caused this? Was it you, ~player~? That guilty look on your face says enough!
Cheaters! Every single one of you! Once I find out how you are all doing this, you will be toast! You hear me? Toast!
I am this close to summoning my flail and starting to bash all your heads in, you cheaters!

Do you have any idea how hard it was to find these immaculate shoes? Within and around the castle, I am the only proper lady within my kingdom. While everyone else is but simple Sprout Moles, who have tofu for feet. Which is, of course, not appropriate for a lady of my caliber.

I cannot believe that you dirty perverts managed to undress me all the way. Here I am trying to be a good sport and play along even when I unrightfully lost a few rounds. But every single one of you misused my generous gifts! Despite this, you still demand I take everything off...!

I am none other than the most wealthy, charming, and alluring princess that has ever walked the Earth! I have hundreds of fans throwing themselves at me every day, statues of myself in every corner of my castle! The name Sweetheart must forever be branded on those feeble little minds of yours!

I am also incredibly humble and give a lot to the poor. Who else would let her underlings live inside of her castle? And the only thing I want is their total obedience and loyalty. It is hard being this generous. But it is just one of the many good deeds I do as the most captivating donut princess of all time!
Kneel, all! You are about to witness the best pair of breasts you will ever witness in your lifespan!
My ever adoring fans would kill for a chance to see me, Sweetheart, in her full unfiltered glory! Though you troglodytes don't deserve it...

Though these might just seem like simple wrist bands to the untrained eye. Like everything else that I wear and own, it is of the highest quality. Made from the most expensive of threads, and made by my servants to fit my elegant figure.
I am the cutest, sexiest, most earnest donut girl that has ever existed! There is no-one in the world who can even come close to how desirable I am!
Now that you know why I am the most important lady here, I expect every single one of you to shower me with your affection from here on out. A princess deserves nothing less, after all.
Rejoice! As the most benevolent and wonderful Sweetheart has given the peasants a sight they won't ever forget!
Here it is! Sweetheart in her purest form! Bask in the glory that is I, Sweetheart! Cry, for you will never ever have a figure more unfathomable than mine!
Those wrist bands are worth more than your entire life, ~player~. So don't try and touch them with your filthy hands.
Don't even think about touching those wrist bands, ~player~. They are far too expensive to be touched by your hands.
Hmph, why am I even trying to tell you these kinds of things? I doubt peasants like you even understand the value of a good set of shoes. I bet that you get all yours from the garbage bin! Ohohoho!
...I just got irritatingly reminded that there used to be weirdos within my castle that kept asking to be "stepped on". At first I thought that they simply enjoyed being tortured... How wrong I was.

However... Ohohoho... How could you all not? With my dazzling looks... My charming smile... My gregarious personality. It must be so difficult to even stand in my presence! Like everyone else I have ever met, you are just jealous of me! And wish to be all that I am! Unfortunately for all of you, that will never happen!
Foolish boy! Did you really think you would last long against the phenomenal Sweetheart?
OHOHO! Is that the best you can do, ~name~?
Disgraceful behavior, ~name~.
Hmph! Child's play! You never stood a chance against the lustrous Sweetheart!
Ohohoho~ How unsurprising.
It doesn't seem like you know how to impress a princess. I suppose I'll keep my expectations low for you.
Leave it to someone like ~name~ to not know how to play a simple card game.
Being a loser fits you well.
Submit to me, ~name~! I, Sweetheart, demand it!
Make your choice, ~name~. Either you take off something good, or I will make you regret it.
Please your princess, ~name~! Bare your body for me.
Grovel before me, ~name~! Worship your princess!
Don't just stand there like a doofus, ~name~! Your duchess is awaiting your attention and obedience!
Go ahead, ~name~. Embarrass yourself for me.
My radiance is everlasting. It's only natural for you to strip and bask in my heavenly radiance.
Nothing you could do would ever compare to my status, ~name~. However, perhaps you might yet surprise me.
You cannot match what I am, ~name~. But if you're that confident to try, then go on. Impress me.
OHOHOHO! Silly boy, how could you ever hope to compete against me?
I will spare but a single moment for you, ~name~. Don't waste it!
A real knight in shining armor wouldn't have lost this round. Which says enough about what kind of person you are, ~name~.
Oh, it's just ~name~ who lost. Nothing of interest.
Choose wisely, ~name~. A bored princess is a dangerous princess.
Better start stripping, peasant. Best not to keep me waiting.
I can already hear your excuses coming out of your mouth about why you lost, but please, spare my ears the trouble.
Oh my, it seems that there is something you are good at, ~name~. Losing!
Don't be a wimp, ~name~. No-one cares what you strip as long as I am here.
Something wrong, ~name~? Afraid you're getting overshadowed by me? The most adorable princess of all time? Well, you are, so stop whining and start stripping.
You had better pick something worth my time! I won't stand for it if you pick something boring while I'm here in my full glory!
Hmph! You get an important chance to impress me right now, ~name~. Give it your all! Or else you're going to regret it!
Why would anyone care that ~name~ has to strip? While I'm here showing off just how amazing I truly am?
Something wrong, ~name~? I'm not distracting you, am I? Ohohoho~
You lost on purpose, didn't you, ~name~? Don't try to lie your way out of it, I just know you did it to show yourself off to me.
Foolish girl! Did you really think you would last long against the phenomenal Sweetheart?
Like taking candy from a sprout!
Yawn. Too easy!
Get used to this feeling of losing, peasant.
A loss for you, means victory for me. As it should be! Ohohoho!
Oh no, ~name~ lost. Who could have ever seen that coming?
Try not to make this too boring.
As I am royalty, this tie should be a win for me and a loss for all others!
That better not be all that you strip, ~name~!
Your accessories are but naught compared to mine, commoner. Now remove them at once!
Don't waste my time with idle chit-chat, ~name~. Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural( are| is)~ hardly deserving of any attention.
Like a pebble trying to outshine a ruby. How pathetic.
I have never met a man that knew how to properly accessorize... And I still haven't.
Nngh... Huh? ~name~ is taking something off? And why should I care about that!? Don't you see I'm busy spoiling myself? Ugh, fine. I'm paying attention.
Think...very carefully about your next move, ~name~. It's a decision between life and death!
I don't care about your silly little story, ~name~. What I want is for you to be on your hands and knees before me!
Hnngg... Stop trying to get my attention while I'm busy with myself!
Oh, yay. I'm missing me time because some douchebag over there has to try and get my attention!
Why even waste your time with such horrid-looking accessories? Keep them home next time. I don't want to see them again.
What an eye sore. Better to get rid of it.
I have met many bachelors that think they could impress me by giving me some cheap baubles. They remind me of what you are taking off, ~name~.
You have too many insignificant pieces of baubles for my liking, ~name~. Yes, I have those as well. But I'm the prettiest girl there is, so I'm allowed to have them. Besides, they look amazing on me.
Is this your attempt at trying to tease me? Ohohoho! I'd suggest becoming a jester. It would suit someone as silly as you.
Ugh, it reeks of being cheap.
If a bachelor ever did dare give me something so horrid looking, I would answer back in kind. By crushing his family jewels.
Words fail to describe just how utterly disappointing you are.
I should be insulted by the utter lack of respect that you are showing me, ~name~. But perhaps I'm being too harsh on you. Can't expect pigs to have good manners now, can we?
I wouldn't want to be found dead wearing that!... Unless you got it from your grandmother... That would be the only good reason to wear it.
If this doesn't end with you kissing my feet and worshipping me, it's not worth my attention.
Do you simpletons know nothing about satisfying a princess?
Move along, I have better things to spend my time on, like loving myself!
Hmph. And to think I gave you a glimpse of my attention, only for you to waste it!
Some people say not to judge a book by it's cover. But if the book had a picture of ~name~ on it, I can assure you I would never read it in my life!
Disturbing a princess while she is touching herself should be a bannable offence!
Good riddance!
Just your ~clothing~? That's not good enough! I demand you take off more!
May I never see something so ugly ever again.
I'm going to pretend you took off something more interesting...
Throw it into the trash bag. Where it belongs!
I can't even imagine wearing something that ugly.
I don't have all day, ~name~. Chop-chop!
I'm certain it took all your brain power to come up with that as your choice of item to strip.
I doubt that this will prelude to something more interesting. But I'm willing to give it a shot, so you had better be grateful.
​Why delay the inevitable? We all know that I'm going to win.
Can't you just skip the prelude and get to the final part of your performance? I'm getting rather bored waiting for such insignificant strips.
Those idiotic fans of mine had better be preparing for the next part of "Sweetheart's Quest For Hearts" while I'm away.
You aren't impressing anyone picking that boring small thing.
Uninteresting and unneeded. Remove what needs to be removed and let us pick up the pace.
Every trinket has its own story. This doesn't mean I'm interested in hearing it.
Nothing you do will take away from my intense self-loving, ~name~. So make it quick.
​Make it quick, ~name~. I desire all eyes to be me, not you.
Don't talk too much, I'm trying to enjoy myself!
Bla bla bla! I'm ~name~, and I'll talk about totally unnecessary things while a beautiful princess is touching herself!
Hmm... I'm amazing. I- Huh? Oh, it's just ~name~ being a dissapointment again.
Bleh, this girl barks too much for my liking, someone put a collar on her.
Just when I thought you couldn't be any weirder, freakshow.
I didn't think you could disappoint me more than you already did, ~name~. But here we are.
Don't expect me to comment on each and every insignificant strip you do, ~name~.
This only further cements the fact that you have no taste.
Is that all you will strip? Do you think you can just waste my time like this? Disgraceful!
Commoners do so enjoy ugly baubles. It's something I will never understand.
Remove as many baubles as you need, commoner. It won't stop the inevitable.
It's almost impressive how someone can be so mind numbingly unexciting.
What a mundane choice. Are you always like this in your daily life? Don't answer that, I already know what you're going to say.
Who even wears such an ugly trinket to begin with?
​May I never see anything so ugly ever again.
​Smart move, ~name~. No-one would care what you would take off while I'm showing my passion.
Your attempts at trying to take the spotlight from me are nothing more than irritating, ~name~.
All that attention hogging just for you to take off a bauble, bleh.
Back to what is really important, me!
Don't disturb my self-loving for something so measily ever again!
I wouldn't want to be found dead wearing something like that.
You aren't important enough to be talking so much, ~name~. Proceed without further delay.
I'm sure that whatever you're talking about is very important to you, but I couldn't care less.
What is this insufferable noise I'm hearing? Oh... it's just ~name~ talking.
Your ~clothing~ look~clothing.ifPlural( like they belong|s like it belongs)~ to a vagabond. Ew.
Boooooooooooooring.
Ugh, hellooooo? ~Name~? The most charming girl you have ever seen in your life is already showing off her alluring body. Take something better off!
Could you be any less interesting?
Time is of the essence, ~name~. If it isn't going to be interesting, don't waste my time on it.
Boring your princess deserves punishment, ~name~. I'm merciful enough to let you know beforehand.
Aren't you supposed to try and woo the pretty princess? It's not that you have a chance with me, I just want to see you try and fail.
Oh, wow. You picked your ~clothing~. How daring, really. I'm tingling with excitement.
No romance has ever started by taking off something dull! Just something to keep in mind.
You won't sweep a princess off her feet by choosing the safe option, ~name~.
Sigh, you really are hopeless.
It's quite miserable that even my stupid fans have better taste in fashion than you do, ~name~.
Why not just strip it all off at once? Spares me a lot of time that I can spend pampering myself.
That was a waste of my time. Let us continue before you arouse my anger.
A peasants prelude is hardly worth my time.
I shouldn't forget to get through all that fanmail I got earlier today.
It is but all too clear to me that you lack the flair to properly entertain me.
I will never understand a commoner's fashion.
Let us continue before I lose my temper.
~Name~ truly is a shining example of not knowing how to impress.
And that is why you're still single, ~name~. Why would anyone be interested in someone as dull as you? Ohohoho! Hm? How do I know that he is single? Well, just look at him!
I'd rather watch paint dry at this pace.
Hurry along, peasant. You're not waiting for your harvest to sprout. You're here to entertain me!
My servants are either on time, or end up somewhere very dark. Just a little something to keep in mind, ~name~.
Me, being the most astounding princess to have ever walked the earth, has better things to do than wait for you to strip, ~name~. So, hurry up.
While you are doing your... thing. I'll be standing here, showing off my magnificence.
Only a fool would throw away this golden opportunity by choosing something so insignificant.
That... thing you're taking off looks like you got it from the garbage can... in other words, it's utterly worthless!
~Name~ clearly doesn't appreciate theatrics.
What is this... overwhelming feeling of dread and sorrow I'm feeling? Oh... it's just ~name~ taking something off.
I'm at a loss for words. ~Name~? Taking off something unexciting? Say it ain't so!
Bah! Is that all you will be taking off? Disappointment must be your middle name then.
Hmph, not pink enough.
Any lady worth her salt should know how to stylize, ~name~. I'd suggest you look into it for your own sake.
I would have picked something more exciting. But then again, I am the most dazzling princess there is!
It's not as if I expected more from you anyway.
...Are you still talking? Ugh, what nonsense.
Hmmm... I could really go for a massage. It's been too long since I last had one.
I could be betting on horse races, or be dining in the most luxurious of establishments. But no, I'm doomed to spend my time with Lady Tiresome.
Had you been any more interesting, I wouldn't have minded waiting for your measly little strip, ~name~. But you are as interesting as watching grass grow.
...Could you at least try to not bore me? I know that might seem hard for a neanderthal like you, but I'm sure even you can figure something out.
At least I don't have to worry about ~name~ trying to steal the spotlight from me. Ohohoho!
...It is a good thing I didn't need to pay to attend this table... I would have demanded my money back by now.
Boring, boring, boring! You're all so boring! You should be banned from playing strip poker ever again!
And that is why you're still single, ~name~. Who would anyone be interested in someone as dull as you? Ohohoho! Hm? How do I know she is single? Well, just look at her!
Well, look at that. So you do know how to be interesting. It took you long enough.
This is much more entertaining than seeing useless baubles coming off.
With your beloved princess watching, there is no way you would disappoint her, right? Right!?
Don't make me regret giving you my divine attention, ~name~.
I doubt this is going to be any more interesting than when you take off an accessory.
It seems that losing has been the only way for you to get my attention, ~name~. I understand you want to impress me, but you will have to do better than that! As I am not easily impressed!
So, you believe your body is of adequate quality for it to be laid bare before me? The one, the only, magnificent Sweetheart? I shall be the judge of that!
Hey! ~Name~! You're supposed to entice me with your stripping skills! And sweep me off my feet! You can't afford to be lazy while performing for a princess!
Go on, ~name~. Impress your dazzling princess.
Let us see if this raises your attractiveness by any significant amount. I wouldn't get your hopes up, ~name~.
For once you didn't disappoint me, ~name~. A rare occurrence that I hope you can maintain.
And another step closer to my glorious victory! Ohohohohoho!
Rarely do I find myself entranced by someone else's body. Yours... doesn't change that fact~
Don't you feel any shame? Showing off your perverted body in front of a princess?
Hardly worth the time of a delicate princess like me.
Your efforts to entertain me are not going unnoticed, ~name~. That's not to say it's good enough, but it is being seen. Ohoho~
But even now, you aren't showing anything truly worthwhile. Such is the life of a plebeian, I suppose.
Took you long enough! Don't you know it's rude to make a princess wait? You should grovel for my forgiveness!
Keep this pace up, peasant. I have waited long enough for my entertainment.
​It doesn't matter how hard you try to impress me, ~name~. At the end of the day, you're just a pleb to me.
Don't try to outshine me, ~name~. Well... not like you ever could outshine me!
Hmmm... not the worst thing you could have chosen. But hardly the best either.
How silly of you to think that something so meager can impress me.
Put your back into it, ~name~. This is supposed to be your big moment! It won't ever be as big as mine, but you should at least try and entertain me by trying!
How joyous to see you strip your ~clothing~, ~name~. I was getting tired from looking at it.
Could it be? ~name~ picking something interesting to take off? My oh my, the world must have gone mad!
It takes a lot of money, skill, and knowledge to properly know how to dress yourself. The three things you don't have!
Keep striping for your princess, ~name~! Grovel and humiliate yourself for me!
Ugh... Could you stop talking for a moment? You are not nearly interesting enough to talk that much.
Have you learned nothing from my amazing performance, ~name~? At this point, I'm just surprised you even know how to bathe! Ohohoho!
Was that supposed to be some kind of big reveal? I found it to be hardly entertaining.
A whole lot of noise for a whole lot of nothing.
Congratulations! You still look as uninteresting as before.
Next time, I'd suggest going on your knees and begging for my help. It's quite clear that you don't know a single thing about being alluring.
I guess your choice wasn't... horrible.
Hmph, you have no flare for the dramatic, ~name~. This would be the moment for a lady to entice all those around her. But it seems you couldn't even do something as simple as that.
Oh my, what is this? has ~name~ finally managed to sweep the oh so charming Sweetheart off her feet? Pfffft... as if.
Only ~name~ could manage to be dull while taking something big off.
For something that was supposed to be a big reveal. You once again managed to bore me, ~name~. It's almost as if you have a natural talent for it.
Have you seen how amazing I look? How am I ever supposed to care about someone like you when I'm right here?
Moment of truth, ~name~. Let's see if you have the kind of body that will make me swoon.
A rare moment in which I will share the spotlight. Don't disappoint.
Let's see if you are worthy of becoming my servant~
​A man's chest is one of the few things that can still impress me, go on.
I don't need your chest to enjoy myself, ~name~. But I still welcome it.
This is the moment to impress me, ~name~! I might just look at you in a different light after this.
Enough diddle-daddle! Show your princess what you're made of!
A dreamy chest is all I desire. You wouldn't disappoint me, right, ~name~?"
What a pleasant surprise. At least you have something good to look at.
Good! Servants should look their best when they serve me.
It's... serviceable. I had high hopes it would be better.
It's not... terrible, but it's not great either.
It was a bit presumptuous of me to expect your chest to be as great as mine.
​Nothing to write home about, but alas. Not everyone can have a chest as perfect as mine.
